animeTitle: Stray Sheep: Poe no Chicchana Daibouken
animeDescription: Stray Sheep is based on the tales of Poe, a naïve, independent and curious ram who finds himself sleepwalking into the most unpredictable situations on his path to reuniting with his herd and finding the “ewe” of his dreams.  (Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Yusa Mimori', ['Theme Song Performance', 'Theme Song Lyrics', 'Theme Song Composition']]]
